msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso contains two columns of names
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides except at the top where it has been torn off. Kollesis near the left edge. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " (Column) 18:;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapetheus, obols 28;;Didymos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Didymos, son of Satabous, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Herieus the older, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, obols 28;;Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Didymos, son of Heron, grandson of Heras, mother Tasiaipis, drachmas 4;;Sabeinos, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Zoidous, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Psenesis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 12, obols 8;;12th year the same, drachmas 4, ? copper drachmas;;Dioskoros, son of Aiaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Thases, drachmas 4;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambas, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas, grandson of Sabeinos, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Anchorimphis, grandson of Horos, mother Achillis, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Artemas, son of Heron, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Pakysis, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Soeris, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 196, obols 16, of which 12th year drachmas 12, obols 11;;(Mecheir) 6 likewise: ;Herakles, son of Petheus, grandson of Onnophris, mother Taseus, drachmas 8;;Heron, son of Ekysis, grandson of Menandros, mother Herais, drachmas 12;;Mysthes, son of Petheus, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, drachmas 8;;Pakysis, son of Phasis, grandson of Esouris, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Chairemon, son of Horos, grandson of Onnophris, mother Segathis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Sarapion, son of Perigenes, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tanais, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Didymarion, drachmas 4;;Phaesis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Polyndikes, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;12th year Anchophis, son of Mysthes, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tanais, ? copper drachmas;;Panesneus, son of Ischyras, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Satabous, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris, drachmas 8;;Petsiris, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, drachmas 4;;Mystharion, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Onnophris, grandson of Maron, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 12;;12th year the same, copper drachmas 8, ? copper drachmas;;Germanos, slave of Longinus Isidoros, drachmas 12;;Sarapion, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Hatres, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Besis, grandson of Thoteus, mother Heras, obols 28;;Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Sabeinos, son of Sisois, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapais, drachmas 8;;Sambas, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 176, obols 12 of which the 12th year drachmas 12, obols 11."
